Package meka.classifiers.multilabel

Class LabelTransformationClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.LabelTransformationClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MultiLabelClassifier, MultiXClassifier, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.OptionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Maniac, MLCBMaD, PLST

    public abstract class LabelTransformationClassifier
extends weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
implements MultiLabelClassifier
    Abstract label transformation classifiers, all classes that transform the labels should inherit from this classifier. The general algorithm is a transformation of the labels into a new set of labels given a specific transformation method. A new multi-label classifier is then trained on the new set of latent labels. The prediction works the other way around, the multi-label classifier predicts the set of latent labels, and a specific transformation method transforms the predicted latent labels back into the original label dimension. Implementing classes need to implement three methods, first the transformation method used for the training process, second a transformation method to create a new instance as input for the prediction of the multi-label classifier, and third, a method transforming the predicted labels back into the original dimension.
    Author:
    Joerg Wicker (jw@joerg-wicker.org)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • transformLabels

        public abstract weka.core.Instances transformLabels​(weka.core.Instances D)
                                             throws Exception
        The method to transform the labels into another set of latent labels, typically a compression method is used, e.g., Boolean matrix decomposition in the case of MLC-BMaD, or matrix multiplication based on SVD for PLST.
        Parameters:
        D - the instances to transform into new instances with transformed labels. The Instances consist of features and original labels.
        Returns:
        The resulting instances. Instances consist of features and transformed labels.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • transformInstance

        public abstract weka.core.Instance transformInstance​(weka.core.Instance x)
                                              throws Exception
        Transforms the instance in the prediction process before given to the internal multi-label or multi-target classifier. The instance is passed having the original set of labels, these must be replaced with the transformed labels (attributes) so that the internla classifier can predict them.
        Parameters:
        x - The instance to transform. Consists of features and labels.
        Returns:
        The transformed instance. Consists of features and transformed labels.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • transformPredictionsBack

        public abstract double[] transformPredictionsBack​(double[] y)
        Transforms the predictions of the internal classifier back to the original labels.
        Parameters:
        y - The predictions that should be transformed back. The array consists only of the predictions as they are returned from the internal classifier.
        Returns:
        The transformed predictions.
